message.entry: Manage Array Sizes for ROS Messages

This Simulink model has ROS messages with variable-length arrays. These arrays will be converted to fixed-length arrays with a maximum length. 
 
Use the table below to specify the maximum length (number of items) for each variable-length array property. These limits are specific to this model.
The Simulink model {0} has already been closed, so any changes to maximum lengths of arrays will be discarded.
If array length of incoming message is greater than specified maximum length:
Use default limits for this message type.
Specify custom limits for this message type.
Maximum length for ''{0}'' must be less than or equal to {1, number, integer}.
